posts.author: DMScreener
posts.content:
In our last session, we encountered a Displacer Beast and tried to use Rules to gain an advantage, but it didn't work out as planned.

How do other DMs balance encounters that involve Rules? I find it either makes combats too easy or too difficult.

When DMing, I like to use Rules as a way to create interesting challenges for my players.

I actually disagree with some of the previous comments about Rules. Based on my experience, it works differently.

In my campaign, we had a situation with Rules that played out really well. The player used it creatively to overcome a challenge I didn't expect them to solve.
